eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: North Dakota; AT 09:00 PM ON OCT 08, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:00 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a required Monthly Test of the North Dakota Emergency Alert System. This concludes the test. No action is necessary.
